Html:
I notice there are several files involved for a binary release, GMAP.NET.dll, WindowForm.exe.

Q: Is it possible to get rid of the separate dll and compile it into strictly into a single .exe ?

The reason I ask, is I am publishing my fork and I want to avoid having to build an "installer".

Any thoughts appreciated.
-cellurl

what do you mean 'installer'?

..i guess you can use some sort of tool to merge the code into one exe/dll

I was going to try and recompile into a big EXE instead of exe+dll.
(so I can distribute it to non-programmers)
But I am going to use this I guess.
TEXT
Thanks
cellurl
